item.title: Scaling Up Private Finance for Clean Energy in Emerging and Developing Economies
item.description: This intend to be a summary post of the “Scaling up Private Finance for Clean Energy in Emerging and Developing Economies” published by the IEA and IFC The Emerging Markets and Developing Economics (EMDEs) group contains the following territories: Africa, Developing Europe, Eurasia, Latin America, the Middle East and South and Southeast Asia. In EMDEs there are 775 million people that lack access to electricity and 2.4B that lack access to clean cooking fuels.
